channel.title: [Help Request]-Hide/Disable CMD Prompt and Custom Crowns
channel.description:
I'm not so sure if this should be posted in Client Hacking or in Client Help - So if need be, please move it. 1.) Hiding CMD Prompt? 2.) Adding custom crowns?
Now.. 1.) I've been looking around trying to find a way to disable the command prompt that pops up when you run the client. The topic that hide your Client Folder and cmd promp that you are supposed to run on your desktop doesn't work. I've tried. Does anyone know a way to hide it so that when I give out the client for download, and when they go to start it up it just shows the client with no CMD prompt. (If this is very jumbled, ask and I'll revise it to make it sound better - In a bit of a rush)
2.) GalkonsPride put out a guide quite some time ago explaining how to add custom crowns - it doesn't work. I've looked and looked and can't even find the current Admin and Mod crowns that are default to the game.. I've been told that they would be under mod_icons in the sprites folder - no. If anyone knows a guide or could simply explain it here on how to add them, that would be nice aswell.
Like I said after #1, I'll revise it and give much more detail if needed to help me figure this out. I've tried for about a month now and I think I have a grey hair. o.O Thanks, Ethan

item.title: [Help Request]-Hide/Disable CMD Prompt and Custom Crowns
item.dc:creator: @Ebowne24 Ebowne24
item.description:
@Ebowne24 wrote:

[quote=“relmitos, post:2, topic:310480”]To answer your first question, you can launch the client without cmd if you JAR it. There should be a nice amount of tutorials on jarring and signing.

Cant answer the second question accuratly, need to know your clients base first. e.g a 317 deob, Bluurs, Proj Fubergen, etc.[/quote]

I forget what the base is now…
I think it’s PK Jadscape’s client?
I’ll find it and update this post.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 08, 2009, 10:38:15 pm[/size][hr]Yes… It’s PkJad Scape’s client.

Read full topic
item.source: [Help Request]-Hide/Disable CMD Prompt and Custom Crowns

item.title: [Help Request]-Hide/Disable CMD Prompt and Custom Crowns
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

To answer your first question, you can launch the client without cmd if you JAR it. There should be a nice amount of tutorials on jarring and signing.

Cant answer the second question accuratly, need to know your clients base first. e.g a 317 deob, Bluurs, Proj Fubergen, etc.

item.title: [Help Request]-Hide/Disable CMD Prompt and Custom Crowns

item.description:
@Ebowne24 wrote:

I’m not so sure if this should be posted in Client Hacking or in Client Help - So if need be, please move it.
1.) Hiding CMD Prompt?
2.) Adding custom crowns?

Now…
1.) I’ve been looking around trying to find a way to disable the command prompt that pops up when you run the client. The topic that hide your Client Folder and cmd promp that you are supposed to run on your desktop doesn’t work. I’ve tried. Does anyone know a way to hide it so that when I give out the client for download, and when they go to start it up it just shows the client with no CMD prompt. (If this is very jumbled, ask and I’ll revise it to make it sound better - In a bit of a rush)

2.) GalkonsPride put out a guide quite some time ago explaining how to add custom crowns - it doesn’t work. I’ve looked and looked and can’t even find the current Admin and Mod crowns that are default to the game… I’ve been told that they would be under mod_icons in the sprites folder - no. If anyone knows a guide or could simply explain it here on how to add them, that would be nice aswell.

Like I said after #1, I’ll revise it and give much more detail if needed to help me figure this out. I’ve tried for about a month now and I think I have a grey hair. o.O
Thanks,
Ethan
